content: शाव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शव-अण्] {@--1@} Relating to a dead body; caused by the death (of a relative); दशाहं शावमाशौचं सपिंडेषु विधीयते <ls>Ms. 5. 59</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 5.">61.</ls> {@--2@} Tawny, dark-yellowish. --वः {@--1@} The young of any animal, a fawn, cub; क्व वयं क्व परोक्षमन्मथो मृगशावैः सममेधितो जनः <ls>Ś. 2. 18</ls>; मृगराजशावः <ls>R. 6. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 37.</ls> {@--2@} A dark-yellowish colour.
